articles.title: Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan ceasefire ends border clashes that killed 49 people - ABC News
articles.description: The presidents of the two Central Asian countries spoke over the phone and agreed the fighting, which saw people hurl rocks at each other and border guards, "must never happen again".
articles.content: Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan have agreed to what they call a complete ceasefire after reports of fresh shooting and troop build-ups in the aftermath of border clashes earlier this week that killed 49 pe… [+2280 chars]

articles.title: UK: Minority ethnic group and South Asians face Covid risk - Telegraph India
articles.description: “This Highlights An Urgent Need To Find Effective Prevention Measures That Fit With The Needs Of The Ethnically Diverse Population”
articles.content: Minority ethnic groups in general and South Asians in particular had a higher risk of testing positive for Covid-19 related hospitalisations, intensive care (ICU) admissions and deaths during the sec… [+2815 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: COVID-19: South Asian people faced greater risk than others in England during second wave - Sky News
articles.description: Body weight, blood pressure, underlying conditions and even household size could be some of the key drivers, scientists say.
